ActJudges Act
SubjectMargaret Austin ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Allan McNiece Austin **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to MARGARET AUSTIN, widow of the Hon. Allan McNiece Austin, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, effective January 13, 2018.
